actions.text: Read second time and referred jointly to Senate Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs by unanimous consent pursuant to the order of the Senate of August 4, 1977.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from General Services Admisistration; CBO; OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a two-thirds vote to adopt a concurrent resolution on the budget which is not in balance.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require, for all fiscal years beginning with fiscal year 1983, a two-thirds vote in the Senate to adopt any concurrent deficit budget resolution. Requires the Senate Committee on the Budget, if such resolution fails to pass, to report a concurrent resolution which does not set forth a deficit within three days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a two-thirds vote to adopt a concurrent resolution on the budget which is not in balance.
